page.title: 08PAIGNTON ZOO
page.content:
The zoo was established in 1923 by Mr.Herbert Whitley.It occupies 75 acres and houses 320 species of animal.It is the third largest zoo in England.Its aims are to promote education and science.Chief education officer Miss Hatley was for four years president on the Association of the zoo Educators.Courses are provided for all schools and organisations in Devon,some in Somerset,some in Cornwall and London.Students are accomodated in a local hotel.In the future they hope to expand facilities for scientic research and to the zoo an International Centre.The zoo is a charitable organisation but employs a marketing manager.
By Alex,Lee,Stephanie, Heidi and Nicholas.
